column3: Why do you need this? In fact myLogLines isn't cleared in 'clear' method intentionally, it allows us to get full log after performing several builds. Though I agree that the name isn't good.
In kotlin we have a test, which rebuilds project many times(over 150) and size of this log is very large(100 mb)
I've added a separate method 'clearLog' to TestProjectBuilderLogger.
